item.title: Fullscreen on laptop?
item.dc:creator: instinx
item.description:
• Right click Black Mesa found in the Steam Library
  • click on Properties
  • click on Set Launch options
  • type in: -fullscreen
  • press ok, play the game.

remember the - so -fullscreen
